title: Ep. 104: ‘Rogue One’ and ‘Black Mirror’ Re-up
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald get ready for ‘Rogue One’ (1:00) and the ‘Black Mirror’ episode “Shut Up and Dance” (30:07). Then they explore the increasingly thin line between ‘Black Mirror’ and reality (39:50).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
